title: SPAC Week, Part II: Why SPACs Make Sense
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: SPAC Week returns with Joe Crouthers, Co-Founder and CEO of Ceres Group Holdings, who discusses with Rena Sherbill why they're focused on the plant-touching side of the sector. Tying cannabis into traditional business. SPACs more collaborative and less adversarial than traditional IPOs. What was irrational exuberance is now based on strong business foundations. The consumerification of cannabis. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
